title: Phillip and the white colt
creator_credit: Richard Sarafian, John Danischewsky and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: A lonely mute boy encounters a wild colt, and attempts to tame it. They become inseparable. The aniimal’s life is threatened and in the suspenseful climax the boy’s love helps to save the colt and restores his own powers of speech. Edited from the 1969 Columbia motion picture entitled ‘Run wild, run free.’
